AutoAI experiments with joined data deprecated
User action required: The AutoAI feature for joining multiple data sources into a single training data set is deprecated. Support will be removed in a future refresh of Cloud Pak for Data. Use a data preparation tool such as Data Refinery or DataStage to join data, then use the resulting data set for training an experiment. Redeploy the resulting model.

AutoAI experiments with joined data not supported.
User action required: The AutoAI feature for joining multiple data sources into a single training data set is not supported in Cloud Pak for Data 4.6 release and later. Use a data preparation tool such as Data Refinery or DataStage to join data, then use the resulting data set for training an experiment. Redeploy the resulting model.

AutoAI experiments with joined data not supported.
User action required: The AutoAI feature for joining multiple data sources into a single training data set is not supported in Cloud Pak for Data as a Service. Use a data preparation tool such as Data Refinery or DataStage to join data, then use the resulting data set for training an experiment. Redeploy the resulting model.
